Summary 
Detail-oriented QA Analyst with expertise in functional testing, test case 
creation, and automation testing within an Agile environment. Skilled in 
authoring and maintaining test cases, executing integrated functional and 
regression testing, and ensuring software quality through automated testing 
frameworks. Strong technical proficiency in testing methodologies, defect 
tracking, and software tools, with a keen eye for identifying and resolving 
issues efficiently. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams to 
enhance software reliability and user experience.

-Effective issue resolution and troubleshooting by leveraging my 6+ years of 
customer service and Salesforce experience to diagnose and resolve client

defects. Strong attention to detail and strong problem-solving abilities. 
-Strong product knowledge and client advocacy by developing expertise in 
company products and services while managing customer needs.  
-Create documentation and reporting by meticulously tracking client 
interactions, issues, and solutions. My technical expertise enables me to 
create detail Jira stories and documentation. 
-Collaboration with counties, technical staff, and product teams to resolve 
complex client issues. Effective resolution through strong verbal and written 
communication skills, along with my calm demeanor.
